member.summary: Supply the context item to be used when evaluating global variables and parameters. This argument can be null if no context item is to be supplied.

member.name: P:Saxon.Api.Xslt30Transformer.GetUnderlyingController
member.summary: Get the underlying Controller used to implement this XsltTransformer. This provides access to lower-level methods not otherwise available in the Saxon.Api interface. Note that classes and methods obtained by this route cannot be guaranteed stable from release to release.

member.name: P:Saxon.Api.Xslt30Transformer.ResultDocumentHandler
member.summary: The IResultDocumentHandler to be used at run-time to process the output produced by any xsl:result-document instruction with an href attribute.
member.remarks: In the absence of a user-supplied result document handler, the href attribute of the xsl:result-document instruction must be a valid relative URI, which is resolved against the value of the BaseOutputUri property, and the resulting absolute URI must identify a writable resource (typically a file in filestore, using the file: URI scheme).

member.name: P:Saxon.Api.Xslt30Transformer.SchemaValidationMode
member.summary: The SchemaValidationMode to be used in this transformation, especially for documents loaded using the doc(), document(), or collection() functions.

member.name: P:Saxon.Api.Xslt30Transformer.BaseOutputURI
member.summary: Get the base output URI.

remarks.para: This returns the value set using the setter method. If no value has been set explicitly, then the method returns null if called before the transformation, or the computed default base output URI if called after the transformation.
The base output URI is used for resolving relative URIs in the href attribute of the xsl:result-document instruction.

member.returns: The base output URI

member.name: P:Saxon.Api.Xslt30Transformer.InputXmlResolver
member.summary: The XmlResolver to be used at run-time to resolve and dereference URIs supplied to the doc() and document() functions.

member.name: P:Saxon.Api.Xslt30Transformer.AssertionsEnabled
member.summary: Ask whether assertions (xsl:assert instructions) have been enabled at run time.
member.remarks: By default they are disabled at compile time. If assertions are enabled at compile time, then by default they will also be enabled at run time; but they can be disabled at run time by specific request. At compile time, assertions can be enabled for some packages and disabled for others; at run time, they can only be enabled or disabled globally.
member.returns: true if assertions are enabled at run time
member.remarks: Since 9.7

member.name: P:Saxon.Api.Xslt30Transformer.ssAssertionsEnabled
member.summary: Ask whether assertions (xsl:assert instructions) have been enabled at run time. This property name has been misspelt, use AssertionsEnabled instead.

member.name: P:Saxon.Api.Xslt30Transformer.MessageListener
member.summary: Listener for messages output using <xsl:message>.

remarks.para: The caller may supply a message listener before calling Run; the processor will then invoke the listener once for each message generated during the transformation. Each message will be output as an object of type XdmNode representing a document node.
If no message listener is supplied by the caller, message information will be written to the standard error stream.
Each message is presented as an XML document node. Calling ToString() on the message object will usually generate an acceptable representation of the message.
When the xsl:message instruction specifies terminate="yes", the message is first notified using this interface, and then an exception is thrown which terminates the transformation.

member.name: P:Saxon.Api.Xslt30Transformer.MessageListener2
member.summary: Listener for messages output using <xsl:message>.

remarks.para: The caller may supply a message listener before calling Run; the processor will then invoke the listener once for each message generated during the transformation. Each message will be output as an object of type XdmNode representing a document node.
If no message listener is supplied by the caller, message information will be written to the standard error stream.
Each message is presented as an XML document node. Calling ToString() on the message object will usually generate an acceptable representation of the message.
When the xsl:message instruction specifies terminate="yes", the message is first notified using this interface, and then an exception is thrown which terminates the transformation.
The MessageListener2 property interface differs from the MessageListener in allowing the error code supplied to xsl:message to be notified

member.name: P:Saxon.Api.Xslt30Transformer.TraceFunctionDestination
member.summary: Destination for output of messages using the trace() function.

remarks.para: If no message listener is supplied by the caller, message information will be written to the standard error stream.
The supplied destination is ignored if a TraceListener is in use.

member.name: P:Saxon.Api.Xslt30Transformer.InitialMode
member.summary: Initial mode for the transformation. This is used if the stylesheet is subsequently invoked by any of the applyTemplates methods.

remarks.para: The value may be the name of the initial mode, or null to indicate the default (unnamed) mode

member.name: T:Saxon.Api.XsltPackage
member.summary: An XsltPackage object represents the result of compiling an XSLT 3.0 package, as represented by an XML document containing an xsl:package element.

member.name: M:Saxon.Api.XsltPackage.Link
member.summary: Link this package with the packages it uses to form an executable stylesheet. This process fixes up any cross-package references to files, templates, and other components, and checks to ensure that all such references are consistent.
member.returns: the resulting XsltExecutable

member.name: M:Saxon.Api.XsltPackage.Save(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Save this compiled package to filestore.
member.param: the stream to which the compiled package should be saved

member.name: M:Saxon.Api.XsltPackage.getUnderlyingPreparedPackage
member.summary: Escape-hatch interface to the underlying implementation class.
member.returns: the underlying StylesheetPackage. The interface to StylesheetPackage is not a stable part of the s9api API definition.

member.name: P:Saxon.Api.XsltPackage.Processor
member.summary: Get the Processor from which this XsltPackage was constructed

member.name: P:Saxon.Api.XsltPackage.PackageName
member.summary: Get the name of the package (the URI appearing as the value of xsl:package/@name)
member.returns: The package name

member.name: P:Saxon.Api.XsltPackage.Version
member.summary: Get the version number of the package (the value of the attribute xsl:package/@package-version
member.returns: The package version number
